targets.expr:
quantile_over_time(
  0.95,
  ({service_name="traefik"} | json Duration | unwrap Duration)[5m]
) by (service_name) / 1e6

options.content:
| Code | Status | Meaning |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **200** | ðŸŸ¢ OK | Success |
| **302** | ðŸ”µ Found | Temporary redirect |
| **304** | ðŸ”µ Not Modified | Loaded from Cache |
| **400** | ðŸŸ  Bad Request | Malformed syntax / Validation error |
| **401** | ðŸŸ  Unauthorized | Invalid or missing API key |
| **403** | ðŸŸ  Forbidden | Valid auth, but permissions denied |
| **404** | ðŸŸ  Not Found | Resource does not exist |
| **499** | ðŸ”´ Client Closed | Browser canceled request early |
| **502** | ðŸ”´ Bad Gateway | Upstream server is down/unreachable |

targets.expr:
sum by (DownstreamStatus) (
  count_over_time(
    {service_name="traefik"}
      |~ "^\\{"
      | json
      | __error__=""
      | DownstreamStatus!="0"
      | DownstreamStatus!=""
  [$__range])
)

topk(20,
  sum by (request_Cf_Ipcountry) (
    count_over_time(
      {service_name="traefik"} |= "RequestProtocol"
      | json | __error__=""
      | request_Cf_Ipcountry=~"[A-Z]{2}"
    [$__range])
  )
)

topk(20,
  sum by (request_X_Real_Ip) (
    count_over_time(
      {service_name="traefik"} |= "RequestProtocol"
      | json | __error__=""
      | request_Cf_Ipcountry=~"[A-Z]{2}"
    [$__range])
  )
)

{service_name="traefik"} |= "RequestProtocol" | json  | line_format "Status: {{.OriginStatus}} Client From {{.request_Cf_Ipcountry}} IP {{.request_Cf_Connecting_Ip}} {{.RequestMethod}} {{.RequestAddr}}{{.RequestPath}} Route To {{.ServiceAddr}}"

{service_name="traefik"} 
| detected_level="info" 
| DownstreamStatus != 200
| DownstreamStatus!="0"
| OriginStatus!="0"
| DownstreamStatus!=""
| line_format "Status: {{.OriginStatus}} Client From {{.request_Cf_Ipcountry}} IP {{.request_Cf_Connecting_Ip}} {{.RequestMethod}} {{.RequestAddr}}{{.RequestPath}} Route To {{.ServiceAddr}}"

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "data.resources"
| mv-expand "target"="targets"
| project "resourceName"="name","fullDomain","resourceEnabled"="enabled","targetId"="target.targetId","targetIp"="target.ip","targetPort"="target.port","targetEnabled"="target.enabled","healthStatus"="target.healthStatus"
| order by "resourceName" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.resources"
| mv-expand "target"="targets"
| project "resourceName"="name","fullDomain","resourceEnabled"="enabled","targetId"="target.targetId","targetIp"="target.ip","targetPort"="target.port","targetEnabled"="target.enabled","healthStatus"="target.healthStatus"
| order by "resourceName" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.resources"
| mv-expand "target"="targets"
| project "resourceName"="name","fullDomain","resourceEnabled"="enabled","targetId"="target.targetId","targetIp"="target.ip","targetPort"="target.port","targetEnabled"="target.enabled","healthStatus"="target.healthStatus"
| order by "resourceName" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.resources"
| mv-expand "target"="targets"
| project "resourceName"="name","fullDomain","resourceEnabled"="enabled","targetId"="target.targetId","targetIp"="target.ip","targetPort"="target.port","targetEnabled"="target.enabled","healthStatus"="target.healthStatus"
| order by "resourceName" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.sites"
| extend "megabytesIn"=tonumber("megabytesIn"), "megabytesOut"=tonumber("megabytesOut")
| summarize "megabytesIn"=sum("megabytesIn"), "megabytesOut"=sum("megabytesOut") by "name"
| order by "name" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.resources"
| mv-expand "target"="targets"
| project "resourceName"="name","fullDomain","resourceEnabled"="enabled","targetId"="target.targetId","targetIp"="target.ip","targetPort"="target.port","targetEnabled"="target.enabled","healthStatus"="target.healthStatus"
| order by "resourceName" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.requestsPerDay"
| extend "time"=todatetime("day")
| project "time","allowedCount","blockedCount","totalCount"
| order by "time" asc

parse-json
| scope "data.log"
| summarize "requests"=count() by "host"
| order by "requests" desc
| limit 2500

parse-json
| scope "data"
| scope "requestsPerCountry"
| project "Country"="code", "Requests"=tonumber("count")
| order by "Requests" desc

parse-json
| scope "data"
| scope "requestsPerCountry"
| project "Country"="code", "Requests"=tonumber("count")
| order by "Requests" desc

parse-json
| scope "data.log"
| extend "time"=unixtime_seconds_todatetime("timestamp")
| project "time","action","reason","ip","location","method","host","path","resourceName"
| order by "time" desc
| limit 100
